title: Solo's Borneo
inclusions_evidence: Airfare Kuching – Mulu – Kota Kinabalu – Sandakan - Kota Kinabalu in economy class

flights.assumed_route: Kuching to Mulu to Kota Kinabalu to Sandakan to Kota Kinabalu

other.notes: Additional costs for meals, entrance fees, and transfers.

reasoning: The travel agency deal includes flights and a comprehensive package that is significantly cheaper than booking separately, providing excellent value.
additional_notes: The deal offers a well-rounded experience with guided tours and activities included.
